death.player.battle_arts.distortion: %1$s lost themselves to the distortion phenomenon.
item.battle_arts.battleaxe.tooltip: Powerful and slow, these axes are meant for battle and can do insane burst damage in a short amount of time.
item.battle_arts.sabre.tooltip: Long reaching and balanced, these swords have fast attacks with the range of a longsword. These swords take a bit more resources to craft.
pack.battle_arts.emissive_trails.title: Battle Arts Emissive Trails
skill.battle_arts.arrogance.tooltip: Gain +5% attack speed and +5% damage taken per stack, gain stacks by landing attacks (+1 stack per attack, must be per attacking move not per hit) [Max: 10]. Lose all stacks upon getting hit.
skill.battle_arts.blossom_slash.tooltip: A series of rapid slashes that deal damage in an area alongside destroying projectiles.
skill.battle_arts.disembowelment.tooltip: Thrust the dagger inside the opponent before cleanly tearing it out. Faster than eviscerate and second hit will always hit.
skill.battle_arts.duelist.tooltip:
A dedicated swordfighter with flashy attacks and excels at duels. Like your typical swordfighter but slightly geared towards offense. 
 Special Skill: Backpedal Counter, when successfully dodging, use your normal attack to perform a counter dash.
skill.battle_arts.fierce_upper.tooltip: Perform one extremely heavy uppercut attack that sends opponents flying at a very high angle.
skill.battle_arts.iron_fortress.tooltip: A defensive art that when activated, grants the user super armor.
skill.battle_arts.journeyman.tooltip: Energetic young warriors wielding axes and often handling weaponry heavier than themselves, has high health and it's family of battle styles can dish out incredible burst damage.
skill.battle_arts.mercenary.tooltip: Sellswords that utilize extremely heavy blades for fierce power and speed.
skill.battle_arts.mug.tooltip: Dash through an opponent, which will guarantee dropping an emerald. Once per enemy.
skill.battle_arts.power_draw.tooltip: Pull back the bow to great lengths before releasing a powerful arrow that can pierce multiple foes.
skill.battle_arts.puncture_swipe.tooltip: Quickly thrust the spear before a quick swipe from the left to right, doing serious damage.
skill.battle_arts.quad_sting.tooltip: Thrust your sword in 4 rapid strikes with incredible speed that can leave an opponent barely breathing.
skill.battle_arts.recruit.tooltip: A upstart in spears, shields, armor, and crossbows. Focuses on withstanding damage and zoning enemies.
skill.battle_arts.recurve_axe.tooltip: Throw the axe a fair distance in front of you before curving it back.
skill.battle_arts.ronin.tooltip: Wandering swordsmen with no master, uses Uchigatana and Tachi.
skill.battle_arts.seismic_impact.tooltip: Leap high into the air and slam your axe towards the opponent, dealing damage in a large area.
skill.battle_arts.sky_striker.tooltip: On the ground, after a short wind up, performs a rising thrust. On the air, performs a falling thrust at a steep angle.
skill.battle_arts.squire.tooltip: A trainee of the swords, bows, daggers, and horseback riding. Quite a versatile class.
skill.battle_arts.squire_heavy_blow.tool: After a small wind up, leap forward with incredible speed, cleaving through anyone who gets caught.
skill.battle_arts.steal.tooltip: Quickly jab an enemy, if struck from behind the enemy drops an emerald. Once per enemy.
skill.battle_arts.suppressing_blow.toolt: After a short wind up, land a paralyzing blow towards your opponent.
skill.battle_arts.test_combat_art.toolti: This art is meant to be tested and not actually used in game.
skill.battle_arts.thief.tooltip: A vigilante who is born and experienced in the art of the steal. Fast and fragile.
skill.battle_arts.tranquility.tooltip: Sheathe or unsheathe your weapon, changing stance and combos.
skill.battle_arts.tranquility_unleash.to: Use while sheathed to perform a dash, used while unsheathed to fire a projectile.
skill.battle_arts.voice_of_distortion.to: The voice calls to you when near death, revives you and increases your offensive stats while sacrificing defensive stats and draining your health until you die. Only available once per life.
skill.battle_arts.whirledge.tooltip: Use both swords to rapidly thrust in quick succession before a dual thrust to finish it off.
